A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''June 17, 2010''', at 12:05 UTC.<ref group="note">The .jar file has a compilation time of June 17, 2010, 12:05 UTC.</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* [[Level previewer]] no longer able to delete the player's inventory<ref>[[wordofnotch:707815872|The level previewer is online]] – The Word of Notch, June 17, 2010</ref>.
